definition: to hope for/to look forward to
to hope for/to long for/to expect
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]

sentences.english: Mother will be expecting me, and getting uneasy.
sentences.chinese: 母亲一定会盼望盼得心神不安。

sentences.english: Having joy produces hope and strength.
sentences.chinese: 有喜乐才会产生盼望和力量。

sentences.english: The media industry is increasingly hoping it stays that way.
sentences.chinese: 传媒业正日益盼望保持这一势头。

sentences.english: Our long-awaited opening of English and thoughtful, and the campus decorated.
sentences.chinese: 我们盼望已久的英语开放周到了，校园里张灯结彩。

sentences.english: I'm really looking forward to this trip with our geology class.
sentences.chinese: 我非常盼望着也地理课同学的这次旅行。

sentences.english: She is looking forward to that being said at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 她正盼望这事儿在会上说说。

sentences.english: As a pastor, I want you to succeed in life.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个牧师，我盼望你有一个丰盛的生命。

sentences.english: We are very interested in an exclusive arrangement with your factoryfor the promotion of your products in Bahrain.
sentences.chinese: 盼望能成为贵公司独家代理，促销在巴林市场的货品。

sentences.english: I like to look at you simple cherubic smile.
sentences.chinese: 期待你，盼望你，幸福的过每一时分。

sentences.english: I will end here and hope to hear from you very soon.
sentences.chinese: 我要就此搁笔了，盼望早日收到你的来信。

sentences.english: Every evening I took great pleasure in doing that, and everybody I looked forward to the early arrival of dusk.
sentences.chinese: 我天天晚上乐此不彼，天天盼望黄昏早早来临。

sentences.english: Welcome to our factory. 154 I've been looking forward to visiting your factory.
sentences.chinese: 我一直都盼望着参观贵厂。

sentences.english: Be sure to let me know if you can come. My whole family is very eager awaiting your arrival.
sentences.chinese: 请通知我你是否能来，我们全家都非常盼望你的到来。

sentences.english: I hope this is the first of mexcellentygarees with the teare.
sentences.chinese: 我盼望这是我跟随队伍插手角逐的早先。

sentences.english: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.
sentences.chinese: 极其幽微的一线盼望就足以点燃爱的火花。

sentences.english: Then the next year's crop and fleeces may repay you to the full.
sentences.chinese: 那么盼望明年的收成和羊毛会全数给你作补偿。

definition: hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
to expect/to look forward to/anxious for sth/to hope (to get sth)
to hope for/to long for/to expect
to hope/to wish/hope/wish/(old) name of an official post
